item.title: Docs: v3.7.10
item.description:
发布时间 2021-12-01 20:04:07

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

27 commits to cloudpods - v3.7.10 since this release.

Bug Fixes (22)

  • fix version of sqlchemy to v1.0.0 for release/3.7 (08d7ef3e7a, Qiu Jian)
  • delayed probing GPU on host init and add disable_gpu option (cba42da3b4, Qiu Jian)
  • vpcagent fail to refresh session token (20dab1e89d, Qiu Jian)
  • cleanup compile warnings (#12622) (c400485b3a, Jian Qiu)
  • close it after using sql.Rows (6b043e2392, rainzm)
  • add license upload (bb5bb827d1, Qu Xuan)
  • false delted field for deleted resources (c803b96fca, Qiu Jian)
  • fail to free reserved ip in non-owner project (ad737c19cb, Qiu Jian)
  • apigateway request api_server option directly from keystone (05812fb3f8, Qiu Jian)
  • ansibleserver: update file-repo from v0.3.3 to v0.3.4 (ff8ea35f96, rainzm)
  • cloudevent: qcloud event time (e673037461, Qu Xuan)
  • esxi: avoid uplink dvpg (ddd9c7b3a7, rainzm)
  • host: only local disk enable file.locking option on arm64 host (8de1411e64, Zexi Li)
  • region: openstack.go (90e3ad8463, yangbaoqiang)
  • region: avoid panic when query is nil (b90811d0bd, Qu Xuan)
  • region: apsara rds network sync (b99eb92ef2, Qu Xuan)
  • region: add rows.Close func (4bf7b68e56, yangbaoqiang)
  • region: delete instance snapshot itself after deleting subsnapshots (b6a8a381f3, rainzm)
  • region: init timerQueue correctly (0bb2ee63d7, rainzm)
  • region: delete vm and disk when it was not found (e015e06072, ioito)
  • region: avoid cidr change 0.0.0.0/0 (4b5b628fac, Qu Xuan)
  • webconsole: host ssh use cloudroot user error (bf9864632e, Zexi Li)

Features (3)

  • cloudproxy: add purge-forward for proxy endpoint (b7c7884c04, rainzm)
  • region: add have-agent action for guest (808c0392fd, rainzm)
  • region,host: create or update server add machine option (#12607) (3a258e01b3, Zexi Li)

Others (2)

  • qcloud&aliyun update backend weight value range fix (2fb770bf19, tb365)
  • guest start sync with cloud vm (33aeb77d41, tb365)

dashboard

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/dashboard

25 commits to dashboard - v3.7.10 since this release.

Bug Fixes (16)

  • 镜像选择查找 (f3cc2436a, GuoLiBin6)
  • modify i18n (5d5d39b70, GuoLiBin6)
  • adjust vminstance sku error (c287a5471, GuoLiBin6)
  • reserved ip free validate (995d75549, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • date select filter error (458607a21, GuoLiBin6)
  • vminstance memory accuracy (75b601b22, GuoLiBin6)
  • cloudgroup add export columns (3f4bb6f84, GuoLiBin6)
  • vm_mem_size accuracy (77ddfa352, GuoLiBin6)
  • fail to free reserved ip in non-owner project (7b7e2bdbb, Qiu Jian)
  • update public cachedimage interface params (659c833ca, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #7932 宿主机提示优化 (3dad21b3d, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #7928 宿主机导出没有平台字段 (29fd6e4d9, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • set machine type on server create (402c3055f, Qiu Jian)
  • disk mount point style (b387f7cce, GuoLiBin6)
  • disk mount point delete swap type (a86693bb7, GuoLiBin6)
  • network status filter (9c6c58025, GuoLiBin6)

Feature (2)

  • support setting vdi and vga of vm (48acc9753, Qiu Jian)
  • support change vm machine type(pc or q35) (cf2bee77a, Qiu Jian)

Features (2)

  • change host dashboard chart color (fa1589415, GuoLiBin6)
  • change kvm ceph disk limit (e1d1de282, GuoLiBin6)

Others (5)

  • create&update secrule add field description (7a803e0b1, tb365)
  • 导出优化 (5c037e4d8, GuoLiBin6)
  • server sidepage details data add have_agent property (84fded042, tb365)
  • feat(#3452): only show user tag (43b921683, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • fix[3.7]: fix columns field (882e19b4e, GuoLiBin6)

sdnagent

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/sdnagent

1 commits to sdnagent - v3.7.10 since this release.

Others (1)

  • update vendor release/3.7 (150a7de, Qiu Jian)

item.title: Docs: v3.6.22
item.description:
发布时间 2021-09-07 14:04:37

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

40 commits to cloudpods - v3.6.22 since this release.

Bug Fixes (39)

  • resolve permission issues for samlusers and quotas (aec0affa1b, Qiu Jian)
  • avoid double counting when compute networks nic count (07aab1daea, rainzm)
  • routes to private prefixes should be distributed on private nic (9290e6fbd7, Qiu Jian)
  • inter-vm traffic limited by eip bandwidth limit (5bbe39749a, Qiu Jian)
  • dhcp classless route encoding error (288c0d5612, Qiu Jian)
  • server migrate network to a vlan network (5fff71781f, Qiu Jian)
  • baremetal: increase ipmitool reboot sleep wait time (18c8973c6d, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: inject mac to cmdline (53a6960478, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: inject mac when admin nic found (89e8b1fdda, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: reindex nic (#12087) (17b80d528f, Zexi Li)
  • climc: add version list command (171792d6ce, Qu Xuan)
  • cloudcommon: avoid service exit when etcd unreachable (dc37976b50, Zexi Li)
  • cloudid: avoid sync clouduser twice (1bd783aef8, Qu Xuan)
  • cloudid: azure attach enabled subscription policy (916fa8d4b0, Qu Xuan)
  • esxiagetn: keep compatible with the lower version vcenter when copying the disk (5a34578f94, rainzm)
  • host-deployer: XFS uuid冲突 无法 mount (8e582878cd, panda)
  • keystone: appsrv listen multi port failed cause of race condition (372b2ff6a1, Zexi Li)
  • monitor: fix resource details can’t show monitor metric (4c668de666, zhaoxiangchun)
  • region: return sql error (3fbb27b8ef, Qu Xuan)
  • region: delete dirty network (8da9634767, Qu Xuan)
  • region: azure vm disk size (b4f4bd7502, Qu Xuan)
  • region: baremetal server reuse ip address condition (3f6db673b5, Zexi Li)
  • region: return region sql error (e86e95faf0, Qu Xuan)
  • region: lb resource count (43ab653d49, Qu Xuan)
  • region: not set baremetal is_maintenance when action is start (dc819e77fc, Zexi Li)
  • region: sync openstack multi zone storages (0025975b4e, Qu Xuan)
  • region: prohibit resizing the disk of a esxi vm with instance snapshots (c58c36eab8, rainzm)
  • region: avoid get openstack hostid panic (935d73f330, Qu Xuan)
  • region: sync with multi worker (b9bb7679eb, Qu Xuan)
  • region: adjust the query range corresponding to the alarm strategy (8a4f0cecd1, rainzm)
  • region: allow guest network zero bandwidth limit (0abdd5195d, Zexi Li)
  • region: baremetal server resued address nic count should be subtracted (f461726f58, Zexi Li)
  • region: resource count for cachedimages (d70235fd11, Qu Xuan)
  • region: enable zstack allocate ip by itself (c6177d7228, Qu Xuan)
  • region: aliyun rds network sync (ca844df22f, Qu Xuan)
  • region: sync aliyun classic network ip addr (40c020e768, Qu Xuan)
  • region: baremetal spec condition (2141af918d, Zexi Li)
  • region: raise GetNamedNetworkConfiguration error (052499e4eb, Zexi Li)
  • scheduler: make option EnableQuotaCheck work (5b9a383e43, rainzm)

Features (1)

  • region: check whether the esxi host is ip or domain name (8959f6675f, rainzm)

cloudpods-operator

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods-operator

1 commits to cloudpods-operator - v3.6.22 since this release.

Others (1)

  • update vendor (82417e29, Qiu Jian)

notify-plugins

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/notify-plugins

1 commits to notify-plugins - v3.6.22 since this release.

Bug Fixes (1)

  • worwx: return correctly when fetch contact (a33198a, rainzm)

ocadm

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/ocadm

1 commits to ocadm - v3.6.22 since this release.

Hack (1)

  • use 99 years certs (0ebffdd8, Zexi Li)

sdnagent

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/sdnagent

2 commits to sdnagent - v3.6.22 since this release.

Bug Fixes (2)

  • tc: aware of ingress qdisc (0c4b0a2, Zexi Li)
  • tcman: delete all qdiscs before batch replace (93ff114, Zexi Li)

item.title: Docs: v3.6.20
item.description:
发布时间 2021-07-22 16:28:31

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

30 commits to cloudpods - v3.6.20 since this release.

Bug Fixes (23)

  • migrate interface before commit desc (57a49f8602, Qiu Jian)
  • host detach wire not update netinterface (a3943097c8, Qiu Jian)
  • qemu-img create disk may fail to preallocation=metadata enable for large disk (b98201c0a2, Qiu Jian)
  • add codes to switch bridge of ovs port (ce86205aa6, Qiu Jian)
  • add cloudroot as system account, so as not using normal user id (0250318839, Qiu Jian)
  • baremetal: compatible with SN empty of MegaRaid (2a927ec7a7, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: use ipmitool power reset when redfish power on error (9f0193574e, Zexi Li)
  • build: baremetal arm64 build (ad98d01e9e, Zexi Li)
  • host-deployer: detect UEFI supported not correct (bca3ca19e0, Zexi Li)
  • host-deployer: make SKVMGuestLVMPartition work fine (7aeb30362f, rainzm)
  • keystone: policy filter by role (8efdcbf92c, Qu Xuan)
  • keystone: user not found error fix (395f74ffd4, tb365)
  • keystone: avoid sql error (58709b21a3, Qu Xuan)
  • monitor: alert policy use ownerId when update (74e00b4322, zhaoxiangchun)
  • region: allocate server eip without hostwire restrict (f5b68f0571, Qu Xuan)
  • region: sync storage before syncing host in syncOnPremiseCloudProviderInfo (ba1202fe16, rainzm)
  • region: set DefaultSysDiskBackend as empty for esxi guest (cafd1b9907, rainzm)
  • region: return rds networks info (ebdd4ee2a1, Qu Xuan)
  • region: rds network sync (9a1e0d26eb, Qu Xuan)
  • region: disable public cloud ip pre allocate (7594720f0a, Qu Xuan)
  • region: handle the error of RequestGuestCreateAllDisks (522aada8b7, rainzm)
  • region: sync auzre subscription health status (e624f422d4, Qu Xuan)
  • region: remove debug info (f4c2799815, Qu Xuan)

Feature (1)

  • allow server switch network without service interruption (cc44b3a6f2, Qiu Jian)

Features (4)

  • host: aware of kubelet eviction config (47d7b434ba, Zexi Li)
  • host: add openEuler rootFs driver (f2b0684160, Zexi Li)
  • hostdeployer: change UserAdd to CheckOrAddUser (665dd2c0d0, rainzm)
  • hostdeployer: change the way fo GetLoginAccount in windows (b9fc69576b, rainzm)

Others (2)

  • minor fixes (55fe3fa3bb, Qiu Jian)
  • update OWNERS (468453951d, Zexi Li)

sdnagent

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/sdnagent

1 commits to sdnagent - v3.6.20 since this release.

Agent (1)

  • ovn: ensure iptables fastpath for geneve traffics (c1f2dca, Yousong Zhou)

item.title: Docs: v3.6.19
item.description:
发布时间 2021-07-02 19:23:36

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

48 commits to cloudpods - v3.6.19 since this release.

Bug Fixes (32)

  • do not resize LVM paritition and skip and return success (3621719dee, Qiu Jian)
  • do not use ntfsresize to resize NTFS partition (a1dfe36637, Qiu Jian)
  • support windows 2003 (3c42e82278, Qiu Jian)
  • Remove the nat gateway when computing network usage (bf6c114e1d, rainzm)
  • get datacenter of host via GetDatacenter (267d83bdde, rainzm)
  • baremetal: nvme allocable (9e812526c0, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: record uefi info (7afa251185, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: remove bundle libs build (aeb73f0c26, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: close ssh test client (7ff1264724, Zexi Li)
  • climc: update climc-base image to 20210701 (e698e1df89, Zexi Li)
  • cloudid: avoid duplicate create saml provider (ccaf955162, Qu Xuan)
  • cloudid: huawei group role attach and detach (bc9ca31351, Qu Xuan)
  • host: allow server directory a symbol link to directory in other location (3bf28fd41b, Qiu Jian)
  • host: get ceph used capacity (4dae72d8ab, Qu Xuan)
  • host: update rbd storage capacity (6a6ca26633, Qu Xuan)
  • hostman: show server status changed reason (4cd723d096, Qu Xuan)
  • monitor: fix monitor process alert (f170d4d6b6, zhaoxiangchun)
  • monitor: fix alert record not return resource details (ffbb3a348f, zhaoxiangchun)
  • monitor: exit monitor engine in time when happen err (6d67fc5d80, zhaoxiangchun)
  • notify: distinct field of receivers (e5097bcdcf, rainzm)
  • notify: clean verifiedNote when marking verified (69eeb1dd01, rainzm)
  • region: clean schedule cache when host add or delete netif (f69b97689a, Zexi Li)
  • region: ignore qcloud bw pkg error (5753071cc6, Qu Xuan)
  • region: baremetal server change ip address reuse (433e03a02a, Zexi Li)
  • region: qcloud bandwidth pkg (542c10bf25, Qu Xuan)
  • region: add project filter for cloudprovider (c86841ede0, Qu Xuan)
  • region: manager distinct field (f8140a13a5, Qu Xuan)
  • region: avoid update storage conf not work (f05468cb4b, Qu Xuan)
  • region: validate disk status when create snapshot (481fdfb656, Qu Xuan)
  • region,scheduler: baremetal reuse ip (b122f1eef4, Zexi Li)
  • scheduler: baremetal network free address out of count (bd882c0610, Zexi Li)
  • webconsole: aliyun vnc windows ctl+alt+del (8eced7fd02, Qu Xuan)

Features (9)

  • add interface INetworkNicCountGetter (bab148685a, rainzm)
  • apigateway: support export dict keys (c2e2a0b246, Qu Xuan)
  • baremetal: support management of none BMC host (e53e36debf, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: add UEFI related util (b6aa4cd39a, Zexi Li)
  • esxi: reduce the number of requests and the amount of data transferred (7692132acf, rainzm)
  • esxi: disable sync cloudimage from image cache (59e52eb7f1, rainzm)
  • host: support netplan configuration (067b2f7fa0, Zexi Li)
  • region: add ProhibitRefreshingCloudImage for options (236b927735, rainzm)
  • scheduler: optimize the speed of network predicate (6b92d1d4f0, rainzm)

Mcclient (1)

  • Sshkeypairs: add FetchPrivateKey (40f7da9ea1, Yousong Zhou)

Procutils (4)

  • WaitZombieLoop: remove unneeded info request (d6c4eeef59, Yousong Zhou)
  • WaitZombieLoop: less verbose iota (1aae46c8df, Yousong Zhou)
  • WaitZombieLoop: use const str “1” for my pid (e8955c6c7c, Yousong Zhou)
  • add WaitZombieLoop (80a1d43302, Yousong Zhou)

Treewide (1)

  • wait possible zombies (1f10232af0, Yousong Zhou)

Webconsole (1)

  • wait zombies (b508901b53, Yousong Zhou)

cloudpods-operator

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods-operator

3 commits to cloudpods-operator - v3.6.19 since this release.

Bug Fixes (2)

  • update process.total name (35494313, zhaoxiangchun)
  • update system commonalert param (f6f14dcc, zhaoxiangchun)

Features (1)

  • add process common alert policy (c1193b60, zhaoxiangchun)

ocadm

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/ocadm

1 commits to ocadm - v3.6.19 since this release.

Features (1)

  • calico,k8s,ovn: 部置calico-node时调整默认配置提升ovn隧道流量的性能 (85383f53, Zhang Dongliang)

item.title: Docs: v3.8.4
item.description:
发布时间 2021-11-09 09:57:14

cloudpods

90 commits to cloudpods - v3.8.4 since this release.

Bug Fixes (70)

  • apigateway request api_server option directly from keystone (a663c5ce87, Qiu Jian)

  • glance depends s3fs (69d66eef67, Qiu Jian)

  • change errors package (b5d55c7ebc, rainzm)

item.title: Docs: v3.8.0
item.description:
发布时间 2021-08-27 13:13:35

  • hcso iam (42fda4401a, Qu Xuan)

Apihelper (1)

ocadm

13 commits to ocadm - v3.8.0 since this release.

Bug Fixes (7)

  • set operator imagePullPolicy IfNotPresent (96432152, Zexi Li)

Features (4)

  • build: 增加arm 下编译 ocadm deb 的步骤(make deb)； 统一跨平台metrics-server 的 tag 名称；升级 k8s-sidecar 到 0.1.275 (d672ebef, Zhang Dongliang)
  • calico,k8s,ovn: 部置calico-node时调整默认配置提升ovn隧道流量的性能 (c4a14ec8, Zhang Dongliang)
  • keepalived,ha: 新增 keepalived_interface 变量支持,以便在安装高可用多网卡情况下支持非默认网卡绑定 vip (866ef392, Zhang Dongliang)
  • longhorn: support migrate to source pvc from longhorn pvc (2df20ecb, wanyaoqi)

Misc (1)

Others (1)

  • update mod (0cc9f1e1, TangBin)

item.title: Docs: v3.4.9
item.description:
